snippet.title: 8-bit space (Available now on Steam)
snippet.description:
8-Bit Space is a simple, exploration oriented platformer, influenced by games from the 8-bit era and from the ZX Spectrum in particular.   

OBJECTIVE 

A new star system has just been discovered. Within one of the systems is an ancient portal, its origins or where it leads are unknown. Research suggests it to be powered by 5 relics. With the help of your ship's computer, Z.X. You have been tasked with uncovering these 5 relics and powering the portal to find out where it leads.

Explore 25 alien planets in the search of your goal, valuable gems are also scattered within each planet, can you find them all?
 
Out Now on Stream:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1452260/8_Bit_Space/

Out Now for iPad:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/8-bit-space-retro-platformer/id1501506439
